channel.title: Minecraft on Nabih Estefan Diaz
channel.description: Recent content in Minecraft on Nabih Estefan Diaz

item.title: CPU Components in Minecraft: 8-bit ALU
item.description: Throughout the semester in out Computer Architecture class, we learned how different logic gates are used to create different components of a CPU, eventually leading up to us building a full Single-Cycle CPU (which you can see in another project). For our final project, Oscar De La Garza and I decided to recreate one of these very important components from a CPU in a different platform than the ones we had used previously: Minecraft.
